page.title: 04Sheep Farming in Rye Area
page.content: On Tuesday 7th May 1985 we went to see a local farmer at his farm to ask him some questions about farming. We asked him how many sheep he has got. He has got 700 sheep and he has 850 lambs. He has 250 acres all at Iden, Playden, near the Star Lock and East Guildford. He has got 4 farm buildings. He takes 20-40 sheep to market when he goes. 800 get sold at the market each week. It is quite busy. He has got one sock lamb. He has neve had a bad season. 20 farmers take sheep to the market. He told us that calves and rams were sold as well at the market.
